column.name: TypeCur
column.summary: Enum:ApptReminderType

Enumeration.name: ApptReminderType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 8 - WebSchedRecall. (Note, not yet used in db, but could be if we ever want clinic specific templates) Defines rules for sending out automated messages for Recalls.

column.name: CommBridge
column.summary: Enum:EclaimsCommBridge One of the included hard-coded communications bridges. Or none to just create the claim files without uploading.

Enumeration.name: EclaimsCommBridge
Enumeration.summary: Each clearinghouse can have a hard-coded comm bridge which handles all the communications of transfering the claim files to the clearinghouse/carrier. Does not just include X12, but can include any format at all.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 21 Canadian clearinghouse. Similar to ITRANS except supports certificate and carrier list web fetching.

column.name: DateTEntry
column.summary: Track Date Created for commlogs. Value for existing commlogs show as blank in the UI. Not editable by user.

column.name: VideoRectangle
column.summary: This is x,y,w,h format for the desktop location of the Video window. This is saved each time the Video window closes. If the Video window is maximized, then the form will instead be like this: "100,120,600,800,Max". The rectangle here defines the RestoreBounds when user unmaximizes.

column.name: Category
column.summary: Enum:DefCat

Enumeration.name: DefCat
Enumeration.summary: Definition Category. Go to the definition setup window (FormDefinitions) in the program to see how each of these categories is used. If you add a category, make sure to add it to the switch statement in DefL so the user can edit it. Add a "NotUsed" description attribute to defs that shouldn't show up in FormDefinitions.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 54 - HQ Only task categories.

column.name: EServiceAction
column.summary: Enum:eServiceAction

Enumeration.name: eServiceAction
Enumeration.EnumValue: 38 - EClipboard - Check In for patients bringing their own device
39 - EClipboard - Check In process started
40 - EClipboard - Check In Arrived
40 - EClipboard - Check In Submitted
41 - EClipboard - Check In Error: Appt Not Found
42 - EClipboard - Check In Error: PatNum Not Linked To Appt
43 - EClipboard - Error: Device Setup for Other Clinic
44 - EClipboard - Check In Error: Device Not Allowed for Checkin
45 - EClipboard - Check In Error: Office Device used as BYOD
45 - EClipboard - Check In Error: No Appointment Found BYOD
48 - EClipboard - Check In Error: No Appt Found
49 - EClipboard - Check In Error: Multiple Pats Found
50 - EClipboard - Check In Error: Signature Error
51 - EClipboard - Check In Error: Deprecated Method
52 - EClipboard - Check In Confirmed Appt With Prov - Yes
53 - EClipboard - Check In Confirmed Appt With Prov - No
54 - EClipboard - Check In Took selfie before submitting
55 - EClipboard - Check In List Did not take selfie before submitting
56 - EClipboard - Check In List Error, submitted without all items
57 - EClipboard - Check In List Submit Xamarin Error
59 - EClipboard - Check In Submit Success
60 - EClipboard - Check In Submit Success BYOD
60 - EClipboard - Check In List Selected Item
61 - EClipboard - Check In List Sheet Next Tapped
61 - EClipboard - Check In List Sheet Prev Tapped
61 - EClipboard - Check In List Sheet Office signed Treatment Plan
61 - EClipboard - Check In List Sheet Patient signed treatment plan
61 - EClipboard - Check In List Sheet Patient signed Payment Plan
62 - EClipboard - Check In List Sheet Patient signed Payment Plan
- Used in Xam Exeptions. If this is sent back, error will not be logged. Default eServiceAction for XamException.

column.name: EServiceCode
column.summary: Enum:eServiceCode EService that this short GUID applies to.

Enumeration.name: eServiceCode
Enumeration.summary: Used by EServiceSignal.ServiceCode. Each service will have an entry here. Stored as an int for forward compatibility.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 41 - A Windows service running at HQ that is monitored by Headmaster.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions Some permissions will treat a zero FKey differently. Some denote it as having access to everything for that PermType. I.e. Reports.

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 51- Allows user to edit all providers. This is not fine-grained enough for extremely large organizations such as dental schools, so other permissions are being added as well.
228 - Allows user to delete tasks.
229 - Allows user to use setup wizard.
230 - Allows user to use show features.
231 - Allows user to setup printer.
232 - Allows user to add provider.
233 - Allows user to edit clinic.

column.name: ApptSource
column.summary: Enum:EServiceTypes .

Enumeration.name: EServiceTypes
Enumeration.EnumValue: Used by the Open Dental API Service.

column.name: FlipOnAcquire
column.summary: If true, each image will be flipped as it's acquired. Because ScanX images are backwards.

column.name: AdjModeAfterSeries
column.summary: If true, then it will switch to Adj mode instead of the usual Pan mode.

column.name: FlipOnAcquire
column.summary: If true, each image will be flipped as it's acquired. Because ScanX images are backwards.

column.name: AdjModeAfterSeries
column.summary: If true, then it will switch to Adj mode instead of the usual Pan mode.

column.name: OrthoHardwareNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: PatNum
column.summary: FK to patient.PatNum.

column.name: DateExam
column.summary: Every hardware entry is tied to a single date. At each exam, a copy can be made of the hardware from the previous exam, and then it can be edited. It normally shows the most recent exam, and the hardware items showing in the ortho grid only include the most recent exam. Not sure yet how we will show hardware for previous exams/dates.

column.name: OrthoHardwareType
column.summary: Enum:EnumOrthoHardwareType Bracket, Wire, or Elastic.

column.name: OrthoHardwareSpecNum
column.summary: FK to orthohardwarespec.OrthoHardwareSpecNum. This is where the description and color come from.

column.name: ToothRange
column.summary: Tooth numbers stored here are always stored in Universal (1-32) notation. They are displayed to the user as Palmer notation. For brackets, always use single tooth numbers, like 8. For wires, must use a range like 2-15. For elastics, typically use 2 teeth separated with commas, but more are allowed.

column.name: OrthoHardwareSpecNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: OrthoHardwareType
column.summary: Enum:EnumOrthoHardwareType Bracket, Wire, or Elastic.

column.name: Description
column.summary: Example NITI 16x25

column.name: ItemOrder
column.summary: 0 indexed. User controls it with arrows.

column.name: OrthoRxNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: OrthoHardwareSpecNum
column.summary: FK to orthohardwarespec.OrthoHardwareSpecNum. Description comes from here.

column.name: Description
column.summary: The description used for picking the prescription from a list.

column.name: ToothRange
column.summary: Tooth numbers stored here are always stored in Universal (1-32) notation. They are displayed to the user as Palmer notation. For brackets and elastics, always use tooth numbers separated by commas, like 2,3,4,5,6. For wires, must use a range like 2-15.

column.name: ItemOrder
column.summary: 0 indexed. User controls it with arrows.

column.name: Pronoun
column.summary: Enum: PronounPreferred Patient Pronoun override. None indicates no override.

column.name: DateTimeDisabled
column.summary: The DateTime at which this popup will be disabled. If this is DateTime.MinValue, then it will never be disabled.

column.name: PatNum
column.summary: FK to patient.PatNum.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 51- Allows user to edit all providers. This is not fine-grained enough for extremely large organizations such as dental schools, so other permissions are being added as well.
228 - Allows user to delete tasks.
229 - Allows user to use setup wizard.
230 - Allows user to use show features.
231 - Allows user to setup printer.
232 - Allows user to add provider.
233 - Allows user to edit clinic.

column.name: SheetFieldDefNum
column.summary: FK to sheetfielddef.SheetFieldDefNum. Only used in the Patient Forms window when the Prefill button is clicked.

column.name: RemoteRole
column.summary: Enum:MiddleTierRole The MiddleTierRole of the instance that created this signal.

Enumeration.name: MiddleTierRole
Enumeration.EnumValue: Workstation that is getting its data from the Middle Tier web service on the server.
This dll is part of the Middle Tier web server that is providing data via web services.

column.name: IsReadOnly
column.summary: Determines if this task can be edited by most users

column.name: TriageCategory
column.summary: FK to definition.DefNum. The category for this task. Currently only used at HQ.

column.name: IsReadOnly
column.summary: Copied from Task.

column.name: TriageCategory
column.summary: Copied from Task.

column.name: DateDue
column.summary: The date that the recall is due.

column.name: CommlogNum
column.summary: FK to commlog associated to this WebSchedRecall.

column.name: IsForSms
column.summary: Deprecated.Generated by OD. If true then generate and send sms.

column.name: PhonePat
column.summary: Deprecated.Generated by OD. Wireless phone number of the corresponding patient.

column.name: MsgTextToMobileTemplate
column.summary: Deprecated.Generated by OD. OD proper can construct this to be any length. Will be converted to final MsgText and sent to patient once tags are replaced with real values.

column.name: MsgTextToMobile
column.summary: Deprecated.Generated by HQ. Applied real text to tags from MsgTextTemplate.

column.name: EmailSubjTemplate
column.summary: Deprecated.

column.name: EmailSubj
column.summary: Deprecated.

column.name: EmailTextTemplate
column.summary: Deprecated.Generated by OD. Includes [ConfirmCode] replacement tag and (optionally) [URL] replacement tag. OD proper can construct this to be any length. Will be converted to final EmailText and emailed to patient once tags are replaced with real values.

column.name: EmailText
column.summary: Deprecated.Generated by HQ. Applied real text to tags from EmailTextTemplate.

column.name: ShortGuidEmail
column.summary: Deprecated.Generated by HQ. Identifies this ApptThankYouSent in future transactions between HQ and OD. Will be used for email thankyous only.

column.name: SmsSentStatus
column.summary: Deprecated.Enum:AutoCommStatus Generated by HQ. Indicates whether or not we were able to send the text message.

column.name: EmailSentStatus
column.summary: Deprecated.Enum:AutoCommStatus Generated by HQ. Indicates whether or not we were able to send the e-mail.

column.name: IsForSms
column.summary: Deprecated. Generated by OD. If true then generate and send MT text message. If false then OD proper is probably panning on emailing the message/GUID so just enter into ConfirmPending and return.

column.name: IsForEmail
column.summary: Deprecated. Generated by OD. If true then generate and send email.

column.name: PhonePat
column.summary: Deprecated. Use Contact instead. Generated by OD. Only allowed to be empty is IsForSms==true. In that case then it is assumed that OD proper will probably be emailing confirmation and does not want a text message sent.

column.name: SecondsFromEntryToExpire
column.summary: Generated by OD. HQ and OD proper are in different timezones. This is used to tell HQ how far in advance to set the DateTimeExpire when entering the row into HQ db. This is a work-around for timezone offset.

column.name: MsgTextToMobileTemplate
column.summary: Deprecated. Generated by OD. Includes [ConfirmCode] replacement tag and (optionally) [URL] replacement tag. OD proper can construct this to be any length. Will be converted to final MsgText and sent to patient once tags are replaced with real values.

column.name: MsgTextToMobile
column.summary: Deprecated. Generated by HQ. Applied real text to tags from MsgTextTemplate.

column.name: EmailSubjTemplate
column.summary: Deprecated.

column.name: EmailSubj
column.summary: Deprecated.

column.name: EmailTextTemplate
column.summary: Deprecated. Generated by OD. Includes [ConfirmCode] replacement tag and (optionally) [URL] replacement tag. OD proper can construct this to be any length. Will be converted to final EmailText and emailed to patient once tags are replaced with real values.

column.name: EmailText
column.summary: Deprecated. Generated by HQ. Applied real text to tags from EmailTextTemplate.

column.name: ShortGuidEmail
column.summary: Deprecated. Generated by HQ. Identifies this ConfirmationRequest in future transactions between HQ and OD. Will be used for email confirmations only.

column.name: SmsSentOk
column.summary: Deprecated. Generated by HQ. Indicates whether or not we were able to send the text message.

column.name: EmailSentOk
column.summary: Deprecated. Generated by HQ. Indicates whether or not we were able to send the e-mail.

column.name: EmailMessageNum
column.summary: Deprecated. Included for backward compatibility (even though we were never passing PromotionLogs via DTO). FK to emailmessage.EmailMessageNum The email that was sent for this promotion.

Enumeration.name: Permissions
